rules_text: If you would draw a card, you may instead look at the top two cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor_text:
[i]“We're creatures of Terrigen. And Terrigen is poetry, running in our veins.”
—Maximus the Mad[/i]
